override.description:
Clears the EnSight Message Window dialog
Examples: | ensight.message_window.clear()
Returns: zero on success, non-zero on error

Saves the contents of the EnSight Message Window dialog to a file.
Args: p0: 'filename' filename into which the contents of the message window is to be saved.
Examples: | ensight.message_window.save("/home/users/me/myfile.txt")
Returns: zero on success, non-zero on error
